title: At Home Beneath the Waves
description: Those fascinated by the ocean can now vacation, dine or even live underwater in these specially designed locations.
dc:creator: Sam Lubell
category: Conrad Maldives Rangali Island (South Ari Atoll, Maldives, Hotel)
Jules' Undersea Lodge (Key Largo, Fla, Hotel)
media:credit: Tor Erik Schroder/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
media:description: Diners at Under, a semi-submerged restaurant off the southern tip of Norway, can enjoy seabed views through a 36-foot-wide acrylic window.
